Posts.EditableText: I was trying to make adjustments in code view and then switch back, and noticed I used to have a tab that opened to speak, ask and tell commands...now it just says features. I notice the game still plays with the ask/tell commands I set but I can no longer view them. I don't know how I made the Ask/Tell tab disappear, so I have no idea how to get it back...any answers?

Posts.EditableText:
Not sure, but I would guess Quest upgraded your game from an earlier version of Quest. To get say the container tab back for a specific object, go to the features tab, and tick Container. For the Ask/Tell tab, go to the features tab of the game object.

I think this was done to keep the number of tabs down to a sensible number for any given object.
